# Taken from Andrew Stockman's web page 4/4/2003

# Wavelength (nm) 
#
# 1a(2°): 2º S-cone based on the Stiles & Burch 10º CMFs Preferred
#
# 1b(10°): 10º S-cone based on the Stiles & Burch 10º CMFs Preferred
#
# 2: 2º S-cone based on the Stiles & Burch 2º CMFs
#
# 3: 2º S-cone based on the Judd, Vos modified CIE 2º CMFs
#
# Lens: Proposed lens density spectrum
#
# Macular: Macular density spectrum based on Bone et al.
#
